Sentencas: In this paper, the optimization of a hybrid solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine (SOFC-GT) power plant is presented.
Titulo: Full load synthesis/desigin optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: The plant layout is based on an internal reforming SOFC stack; it also consists of a radial gas turbine, centrifugal compressors and plate-fin heat exchangers.
Titulo: Full load synthesis/desigin optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: In the first part of the paper, the bulk-flow model used to simulate the plant is presented.
Titulo: Full load synthesis/desigin optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: In the second part, a thermoeconomic model is developed by introducing capital cost functions.
Titulo: Full load synthesis/desigin optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: The whole plant is first simulated for a fixed configuration of the most important synthesis/design (S/D) parameters in order to establish a reference design configuration.
Titulo: Full load synthesis/desigin optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: Next a S/D optimization of the plant is carried out using a traditional single-level approach, based on a genetic algorithm.
Titulo: Full load synthesis/desigin optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: The optimization determined a set of S/D decision variable values with a capital cost significantly lower than that of the reference design, even though the net electrical efficiency for the optimal configuration was very close to that of the initial one.
Titulo: Full load synthesis/desigin optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: Furthermore, the optimization procedure dramatically reduced the SOFC active area and the compact heat exchanger areas.
Titulo: Full load synthesis/desigin optimization of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant
